name: Motivus
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: say something positive
des: This skill is intended to bring a positive stroke of light whenever it may feel like the darkest of days. If you need a little pump of motivation or some words of insight, just ask your Amazon Echo device to "Say something positive".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
